step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Ensure your elbows stay close to your head as you raise them.
You're doing well sliding your hands behind your head. Try to spread your elbows wider to increase the stretch.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide. Keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Holding the stretch well. Remember to maintain an upright head position.
Great job reversing the motion. You're returning to the starting position smoothly.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your elbows close when raising your hands and spreading them wider behind your head for a better stretch. Remember to keep your head up throughout.
